DOC.brief_summary: It suggest therapeutic effect repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( rTMS ) mediate change cortical inhibition ( CI ) . However , healthy subject effect rTMS CI inconsistent . The aim study explore different rTMS - stimulus condition neurophysiological molecular mechanism human motor cortex . Fifty-six healthy subject randomize three different treatment group receive 1 active sham rTMS session ( 6000 rTMS pulse ) 90 % motor threshold ( MT ) . Cortical inhibition index pre post treatment use short-interval intracortical inhibition ( SICI ) , cortical silent period ( CSP ) long-interval cortical inhibition ( LICI ) . Based previous study hypothesize : - Hypothesis 1 : rTMS result great CI ( i.e. , prolong CSP , increase LICI SICI ) compare sham rTMS . - Hypothesis 2 : 20 Hz rTMS result significantly great CI compare 1 Hz rTMS . - Hypothesis 3 : There distinctive transcription profile associate increase CI rTMS detect whole-genome microarray analysis peripheral leukocyte .
